title: Augusta County: Tony Pastor to Annie Harris, December 24, 1861
summary: Pastor writes that his Company, without him because of an illness, traveled to destroy a dam but was unsuccessful. He says that he and his fellow soldiers are considering joining the regular army so that they can have furloughs.
keywords: Battle Description, Camp Life, Death/Casualties, Military Authority, Military Strategy, Patriotism, Prisons/Prisoners, Troop Movement, American Civil War
